svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - May 4 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 4, 2024" date: "2024-05-04"
Eth News and Links
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes .Â Notes from Christine Kim : Confirmation rule research :
algorithm determines if block always in canonical chain Pectra-devnet-0 : plan to launch in ~10 days, client teams making good progress,
attestation refactoring for EIP7549 taking extra time EIP7684 return deposits for distinct credentials : proposal to mitigate deposit
front-running for staking pools PeerDAS : client teams making progress, synchrony assumption on sampling discussion
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes .Â Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Confirmation rule research : algorithm determines if block always in canonical chain
Confirmation rule research : algorithm determines if block always in canonical chain
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-0 : plan to launch in ~10 days, client teams making good progress, attestation refactoring for EIP7549 taking extra time
Pectra-devnet-0 : plan to launch in ~10 days, client teams making good progress, attestation refactoring for EIP7549 taking extra time
â€¢ EIP7684 return deposits for distinct credentials : proposal to mitigate deposit front-running for staking pools
EIP7684 return deposits for distinct credentials : proposal to mitigate deposit front-running for staking pools
â€¢ PeerDAS : client teams making progress, synchrony assumption on sampling discussion
PeerDAS : client teams making progress, synchrony assumption on sampling discussion
â€¢ consensus-specs/releases v1.5.0-alpha.1 : CL spec target of pectra-devnet-0, bug fixes for test cases & new fork tests
consensus-specs/releases v1.5.0-alpha.1 : CL spec target of pectra-devnet-0, bug fixes for test cases & new fork tests
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS12 precompile benchmarks
EIP2537 BLS12 precompile benchmarks
â€¢ Future of EOA/AA breakout call #2 scheduled for May 7 Yoav Weiss: Account Abstraction roadmap , towards native AA starting with L2
Future of EOA/AA breakout call #2 scheduled for May 7
â€¢ Yoav Weiss: Account Abstraction roadmap , towards native AA starting with L2
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.68% still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.68% still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~63% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~63% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~63% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Erigon switching development to v3
Erigon switching development to v3
â€¢ Slashing Proofoor : prove a validator hasnâ€™t been slashed using EIP4788 beacon block root in EVM
Slashing Proofoor : prove a validator hasnâ€™t been slashed using EIP4788 beacon block root in EVM
â€¢ Terence: builder reveal timing game post ePBS
Terence: builder reveal timing game post ePBS
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.4.0 : stability & performance improvements
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Nimbus v24.4.0 : stability & performance improvements
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon Otterscan v2.5.0 alpha : improved Optimism support
Execution layer:
â€¢ Erigon Otterscan v2.5.0 alpha : improved Optimism support
â€¢ Otterscan v2.5.0 alpha : improved Optimism support
For Stakers
â€¢ Teku adds client info to graffiti : appends client types & versions to improve client diversity data, opt-out
Layer 2
â€¢ Lattice Redstone live, uses Plasma mode offchain data availability
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs: EIP7701 : Native account abstraction with EOF
EIPs:
â€¢ EIP7701 : Native account abstraction with EOF
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7700 : Cross-chain storage router protocol
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7700 : Cross-chain storage router protocol
Stuff for developers
â€¢ EIP5792 site (wallet call API): API reference, capabilities & ecosystem support
EIP5792 site (wallet call API): API reference, capabilities & ecosystem support
â€¢ Wagmi v2.8.0 : adds experimental EIP5792 actions & hooks
Wagmi v2.8.0 : adds experimental EIP5792 actions & hooks
â€¢ Reth Execution Extensions (ExEx): post-execution hooks for building offchain infrastructure
Reth Execution Extensions (ExEx): post-execution hooks for building offchain infrastructure
Security
â€¢ Pike ~$2M in two exploits , first via weak security handling of cross-chain transfer protocol transfers (identified by auditor) and
second via faulty upgrade to pause the protocol
Pike ~$2M in two exploits , first via weak security handling of cross-chain transfer protocol transfers (identified by auditor) and second
via faulty upgrade to pause the protocol
â€¢ DeFi risk modeling : security implications of economic research
DeFi risk modeling : security implications of economic research
Ecosystem
â€¢ Ethereum reached 1 million validators
Job Listings
â€¢ stakefish : DevOps Engineer & Full-stack Engineer
stakefish : DevOps Engineer & Full-stack Engineer
â€¢ Devcon: Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
â€¢ ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Developer Relations - Sygma
ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Developer Relations - Sygma
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 3.4 to 91.4 gwei, with 8.4 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 23.2 gwei 11k ETH net issuance
this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 3.4 to 91.4 gwei, with 8.4 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 23.2 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 23.2 gwei

11k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,859 - $3,342, currently $3,102
ETHUSD : $2,859 - $3,342, currently $3,102
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.049 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.049 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Fantasy.top (CryptoTwitter fantasy sports game) live on Blast. If you need a signup code
Fantasy.top (CryptoTwitter fantasy sports game) live on Blast.
â€¢ If you need a signup code
â€¢ Friendtech v2 : adds clubs & $friend airdrop
Friendtech v2 : adds clubs & $friend airdrop
â€¢ Eigen token , non-transferable & airdrop geoblocked after allowing deposits from those countries
Eigen token , non-transferable & airdrop geoblocked after allowing deposits from those countries
â€¢ Aave proposed roadmap : v4, cross-chain liquidity layer, real world asset products built around GHO stablecoin and Aave network
Aave proposed roadmap : v4, cross-chain liquidity layer, real world asset products built around GHO stablecoin and Aave network
â€¢ Paragraph acquires Mirror
Paragraph acquires Mirror
â€¢ DefiLama airdrops : check any address, no signing or signup required
DefiLama airdrops : check any address, no signing or signup required

Gitcoin Grants donation history for an address

A look at yields in DeFi

General
â€¢ Vitalik: Binius , efficient proofs over binary fields
Vitalik: Binius , efficient proofs over binary fields

END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
